keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap t
map tt createTab
map tn nextTab
map tp previousTab

unmap <<
map < moveTabLeft
unmap >>
map > moveTabRight

map ym Vomnibar.activate query=javascript:navigator.clipboard.writeText(%60%5B%24%7Bdocument.title%7D%5D(%24%7Bwindow.location.href%7D)%60)%3B
map yt Vomnibar.activate query=javascript:navigator.clipboard.writeText(document.querySelector(%22h1.gh-header-title%20.js-issue-title%22)%20%3F%20document.querySelector(%22h1.gh-header-title%20.js-issue-title%22).textContent.trim()%20%3A%20document.title)%3B
map tb Vomnibar.activate query=javascript:(function()%20%7B%0A%20%20if%20(window%20!%3D%20window.parent)%20return%3B%0A%20%20let%20location%3B%0A%20%20let%20hatenaUrl%3B%0A%20%20const%20maxLength%20%3D%20277%3B%0A%0A%20%20const%20canonical%20%3D%20document.querySelector('link%5Brel%3D%22canonical%22%5D')%3B%0A%0A%20%20if%20(canonical)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20location%20%3D%20new%20URL(canonical.href)%3B%0A%20%20%7D%20else%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20location%20%3D%20window.location%3B%0A%20%20%7D%0A%0A%20%20const%20%7Bpathname%2C%20hostname%2C%20protocol%2C%20search%2C%20hash%7D%20%3D%20location%3B%0A%20%20const%20isHttps%20%3D%20protocol%20%3D%3D%3D%20%22https%3A%22%3B%0A%20%20const%20baseUrl%20%3D%20'http%3A%2F%2Fb.hatena.ne.jp%2Fentry%2F'%20%2B%20(isHttps%20%3F%20%22s%2F%22%20%3A%20%22%22)%0A%0A%20%20if%20(hostname%20%3D%3D%3D%20%22medium.com%22)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20const%20paths%20%3D%20pathname.split(%22%2F%22)%3B%0A%20%20%20%20const%20filename%20%3D%20paths%5Bpaths.length%20-%201%5D.split(%22-%22)%0A%20%20%20%20const%20hash%20%3D%20filename%5Bfilename.length%20-%201%5D%3B%0A%20%20%20%20const%20mediumPath%20%3D%20paths.slice(0%2C%20paths.length%20-%201).concat(%5Bhash%5D).join(%22%2F%22)%3B%0A%20%20%20%20hatenaUrl%20%3D%20baseUrl%20%2B%20hostname%20%2B%20mediumPath%3B%0A%20%20%7D%20else%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20hatenaUrl%20%3D%20baseUrl%20%2B%20hostname%20%2B%20pathname%3B%0A%20%20%7D%0A%20%20window.open((hatenaUrl%20%2B%20search%20%2B%20encodeURIComponent(hash)).slice(0%2C%20maxLength))%3B%0A%7D)()
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
